doc:
Carmen Osbahr https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carmen_Osbahr 0 Carmen Osbahr-Vertiz (born April 21, 1962) is a Mexican-born American puppeteer who has puppeteered Rosita in the popular US children's series Sesame Street, since 1991. Osbahr has also puppeteered Kiki Flores in The Puzzle Place and Lily in Johnny and the Sprites. Rosita and Armando (Ismael Cruz Còrdova) appeared to promote season 44 of Sesame Street. September 8–10, 2017, she was an additional Muppet performer for a live show at the Hollywood Bowl titled The Muppets Take the Bowl. Carmen_Osbahr-Vertiz ( born April_21_,_1962 ) is a_Mexican-born_American_puppeteer who has_puppeteered Rosita in the_popular_US_children 's_series_Sesame_Street , since 1991 . Osbahr has also_puppeteered_Kiki_Flores in The_Puzzle_Place and Lily in Johnny and the_Sprites . Rosita_and_Armando_(_Ismael_Cruz_Còrdova_) appeared_to_promote season_44 of Sesame_Street . September_8 – 10_,_2017 , she was an_additional_Muppet_performer for a_live_show at the_Hollywood_Bowl titled The_Muppets Take the_Bowl .
